q: LONDON( Reuters)- Google Inc. wants to avoid a lengthy legal battle with European Union regulators investigating its market dominance, the Sunday Telegraph quoted its chief executive as saying. Philadelphia coach Maurice Cheeks is used to Kobe Bryant 's shooting show.`` Kobe Bryant makes shots, we kept saying they were incredible shots and for most people they are,'' Maurice Cheeks said. But for Kobe Bryant , I don't think they were incredible. He does things like that on an everyday basis.
